Package org.hazelwire.gui

Class Summary
BrowseMouseListener This class, BrowseMouseListener is a subclass of MouseListener.
Challenge Instances of this class represent a challenge, which is a part of a Mod that represents a Flag and the values associated with it.
ChallengesTree This class is necessary to update the tree of Challenges that is displayed in the GUI.
ConfigExportListener This class is responsible for converting the current generation settings to an XML file.
ConfigFile This class keeps track of both the configurations the user specifies and the default configurations that Hazelwire provides.
ConfigImportMouseListener This class is used for reading an XML file containing Virtual Machine configuration information (as generated in ConfigExportListener) and converting it so that the GUI displays and stores it correctly.
ConfigListener This class is responsible for taking the user input with regard to the configuration settings and storing them in the system.
DefaultMouseListener This class is responsible for restoring the default values for all the options of a Mod.
DownloadBarLink  
DownLoadListener Class DownLoadListener is responsible for downloading the Hazelwire base Virtual Machine.
ErrorDialog A class for graphically displaying error messages.
GenerateDialog This class is responsible for showing information regarding the generation of the Virtual Machine and the XML file associated with it.
GenerateListener This class is responsible for starting the VM generation process.
GUIBridge This class is the bridge between the backend and the GUI.
GUIBuilder This class is responsible for drawing the VM generation GUI.
GUIOutput  
ImportMouseListener This class is used to import Mods into the system and to display them in the GUI.
Mod This class is the GUI's representation for a module.
ModListPainter This class is responsible for painting the list of selected Mods on the 'Module Selection' tab.
ModsBookkeeper This class keeps track of all the Mods.
OptionsCompListener This class is responsible for detecting adaptations to the OptionsComposites on the 'settings' tab.
OptionsComposite This class draws the three important Widgets for an option and keeps them together and accessible.
OverviewPainter This class is responsible for painting the list of selected Mods on the 'VM Generation' tab.
PointsListener This class is responsible for changing the value of a certain Challenge.
Searcher This class controls the search Text on the 'Module Selection' tab.
Tag This class represents a tag: an indication of what a Mod or Challenge entails.
TagListPainter This class is responsible for painting the list of Tags on the 'VM Generation' tab.
TagTree This class is responsible for displaying all available Mods, sorted by Tag.
VMGenerationThread  
VMNameListener This class is responsible for taking the user input with regard to the configuration settings and storing them in the system.
